main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in Globe, Arizona during November 1957.
interesting points: The first sighting on November 5 involved about 12-15 round objects, size of a dime, observed for 5-10 minutes,The second sighting involved three objects in a line, also size of dimes, which passed one another for about 3 minutes on November 25,The sightings were classified as possibly being balloons or aircraft,Binoculars were used to observe some of the objects,The report is part of the historical U.S. Air Force Project Blue Book.
sighted object: round objects, size of a dime
witness description: Mrs. Allison, a civilian from Globe, Arizona
